title: Tom Hawkins
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140815070728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Tom Hawkins**

Tom was the inventor of the [Intellifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140815070728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Intellifont) [hinting](http://web.archive.org/web/20140815070728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/hinting) technology while working at [Compugraphic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140815070728/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Compugraphic) in the 1980s.
author: vinceconnare
